<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bottled Lightning](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3290)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=528" />
<trait label="Bomb" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=548" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Electricity" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=586" />
<trait label="Splash" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=699" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 284 <sup>1.1</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Strike</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Bottled lightning is packed with volatile reagents that create a blast of electricity when they're exposed to air. Bottled lightning deals the listed electricity damage and [electricity splash damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29). On a hit, the target becomes [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) until the start of your next turn. Many types grant an item bonus to attack rolls.

</column>
